name: Lucknow IPL Team
alt_name: Rising Lucknow Supergiant or Lucknow Supergiant
ground: Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium, Lucknow (Capacity : 50,000)
ipl_wins: The '''Lucknow IPL Team''' is a franchise cricket team based in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, that will  play in the Indian Premier League from the 2022 season. The team was founded on 25th October 2021 by a bidding process in Dubai.Currently only the city is confirmed as Lucknow, The Name, Jersey and Logo's are yet to be announced. |
